args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Carville, James
email: info@sherrodbrown.com
subject: Every single Democrat NEEDS to pay attention to Sherrod's Senate race RIGHT NOW
body: Friend, I'm about to ask you to chip in every dollar you can to help SherrodBrown win in Ohio and defend our Democratic Senate majority – but first, letme explain why this is so damn important for ALL of us. But hell, if you wantto click here and chip in right away, I'm not gonna stop you.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text I'll get right into it:Democrats have a razor-thin Senate majority, and we're facing a NIGHTMARESenate map. There's a strong chance it will all come down to Ohio, which meansSherrod is the ONLY thing standing between us and a Republican Senate. Friend,I've worked on campaigns for a long time. I've been on the winning side andthe losing side. If there's one thing I know, it's that money makes a BIGdifference. I wish it weren't the case, but it is. TV ads, phone banks, yardsigns, campaign events in every corner of the state – it all adds up FAST.That's why I'm so terrified right now. If this were a simple battle betweengood and evil, I wouldn't be worried – Sherrod is as good a leader as Ohioanshave ever had. He fights harder for workers than anybody I know, and he's notafraid to take on the big banks and corporations that are making things harderfor the middle class. But money muddies the waters, and his opponent has got aton of it. He's poured A TON into his own campaign, and there's a lot morewhere that came from. Sherrod simply doesn't have that kind of money – sothat's where this grassroots team needs to come in and have his back, friend.I know Sherrod can win this critical race and keep the Senate blue, but ONLYIF we all come together to give him the resources he needs. So I'm asking:Will you rush $5, $25, or even $50 to help him win in Ohio and defend ourSenate majority? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text Thanks for doingyour part – there's simply no other option if we want to save the Senate! –James Carville -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Tounsubscribe from this email list, please click here:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/tClQUZwGoEOS_rmuR1aPwA2?unsubscribedata=mFox1kfntjRdyJ%2FJ9a8zzXyAY8Ixhu3JdUgiGzHKID9In7GSgfLf1kju%2BdnSoQf7USQh4o3lwG4O8NFRK9H8t0Bu9kejtbQQ%2F%2FKJpJR8G1dqPUK0T6KRtr0UxuKTZ%2FrryRD2AllaH66PO0KhoGkcWlV4xX0Tud84Y%2FW4RgBb9JPHvTfdPNfiHAvbOHrIiTS3dM0w3GCOYbx1VOGHF2UZWq7gwNdBCZ0glb0RwIFE4ItpOYdEcvYC%2FtpNUsvi8SA7dggHaaWmY1U%2BNDqDGs9KiP9NcrstV2gW9lf5SsSzo2MuHqyUP2FSNejO8Y%2FNHHO88MuMTsBRdG00WWXSTZqUJLG45sb2IThbQN6PlKkD6BVjL7g9dx6r1nWeF60Eh7jbkgkHJACS2sNL2JaKYFu5Rrfn7FHO15P0%2FnWlWodEX3FHqdMPbrFphfZAKKXZbRyUFriends of Sherrod Brown 605 N. High Street, Ste. 226 Columbus, OH 43215 Ifyou’d like to receive fewer emails, please click here:https://secure.ngpvan.com/76LkOeqzVUW-03lEkGJMbg2 PAID FOR BY FRIENDS OFSHERROD BROWN
